main_definition: Nails, in the context of an idiom, can refer to a situation that is handled very well or perfectly done.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A fastening device made typically of metal
meanings_and_examples.example: She hammered the nails into the wooden plank.

meanings_and_examples.definition: To hit something or someone with one's fingernail forcefully
meanings_and_examples.example: He accidentally nails his finger while trying to open a tightly sealed package.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Achieving perfection or handling a situation very well
meanings_and_examples.example: The team nailed the presentation, impressing everyone with their preparation and delivery.
